Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements about the <font face="courier new">Panel</font> and <font face="courier new">GroupBox</font> controls are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">VisibleChanged()</font> method of the panel control is invoked when the value of the <font face="courier new">Enabled</font> property changes.
The <font face="courier new">Anchor</font> property of the group box control is used to set the dimensions of the control.
A <font face="courier new">Panel</font> control is displayed without a border on a form.
The <font face="courier new">Resize</font> event of the group box control is invoked when the size of the control automatically changes.
The <font face="courier new">FlatStyle</font> property of the panel control is used to specify the style using the <font face="courier new">FlatStyle</font> enumeration.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(False), (B)-(False), (C)-(True), (D)-(True), and (E)-(False).
